backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling authorization, user profiles, product defaults, and order storage with access‑controlled queries and updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to involved frontend files, components, and test references.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining warm OKLCH color tokens, dark mode variables, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry for the PWA including meta tags, manifest link, theme color, and root mount point.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app name, colors, icons, start URL, and standalone display mode.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app with router setup, header/footer layout, navigation, cart badge, and integrated Add‑to‑Home‑Screen UI.
Component showing install button or iOS instructions based on PWA installability state.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Frontend config and utilities for optional UPI-style online payment settings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor using identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAddToHomeScreen.ts: Provides PWA install prompt handling, tracking installability, installation state, and iOS detection.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines product, order, admin, and price update queries and mutations using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom color variables and theme styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminRatesPage.tsx: Admin UI for viewing, refreshing, and updating product prices with authentication and error handling.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays cart items with live pricing, quantity controls, and handling of missing products.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Implements checkout form with validation, payment link handling, price calculation, and order creation before redirecting to confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information, business hours, and a brief brand description.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows homepage hero banner, product highlights, and navigation links to products and contact pages.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Fetches and displays confirmed order details with copyable pickup note and Rapido booking link.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailsPage.tsx: Provides order lookup by ID with input validation and displays fetched order details.
frontend/src/pages/ProductsPage.tsx: Fetches and lists dairy and frozen dessert products with add-to-cart functionality and loading/error states.
frontend/src/state/cart/CartContext.tsx: Provides a React context for cart state with add, update, remove, clear, total, count, and price‑sync functionality persisted in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/state/cart/cartTypes.ts: Defines the CartItemType interface containing productName, price, and quantity.
frontend/src/utils/cartPricing.ts: Calculates cart totals using latest product prices and flags missing items, returning enriched pricing info.
frontend/src/utils/payment.ts: Builds UPI payment deep-link URLs and formats payment notes for orders.
frontend/src/utils/rapidoPickupNote.ts: Generates a formatted pickup note for Rapido containing order details and item list.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing scope, requirements, features, issues, and architectural notes for the DAIRY FIELD app.
